column5: I know a couple of members here served his country, both the US and Canada, just wanted you to know I'm thinking of all who did, and am thankfull for them.  Hope you all have a good day.  Maureen
And to those who gave the ULTIMATE sacrifice that others may live as our two countries stood side-by-side.  Blessed is he who lays down his life for another.   We shall never forget.
